name: whorang
description: who-rang turns your smart doorbell into an AI-powered visitor identification system. It uses face recognition and multiple AI providers to classify visitors, log events, and present rich analytics via a self-hosted web dashboard.
features: Visitor identification: Use AI-powered face recognition to identify people at your door automatically.
Multi-provider support: Integrate with various AI services including OpenAI, Google Vision, or local models.
Event logging: Record all doorbell events with timestamps, images, and identification results.
Real-time alerts: Receive notifications when someone rings the doorbell with visitor identification details.
Visitor database: Build a database of known visitors with names, photos, and visit history.
Unknown detection: Get alerted when unrecognized individuals appear at your door for security monitoring.
Analytics dashboard: View statistics on visitor frequency, peak times, and identification accuracy.
Image storage: Store doorbell camera snapshots for review and training the recognition system.
Privacy controls: Configure data retention policies and manage stored visitor information.
Integration support: Connect with popular smart doorbell brands and camera systems.
Custom notifications: Set up different alert types for family members, delivery personnel, or strangers.
Historical search: Search past events by date, person, or identification confidence level.
